mapper.insert: insert into ec_cust_demand (demand_no, cust_no, gather_date, demand_nam, demand_typ, demand_phase, demand_desc, process_sts, principal, create_date, create_time, create_user, update_date, update_time, update_user, time_stamp, rec_stat) values (#{demandNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{custNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gatherDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{demandNam,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{demandTyp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{demandPhase,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{demandDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{processSts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{principal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{timeStamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{recStat,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update ec_cust_demand set cust_no = #{custNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gather_date = #{gatherDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, demand_nam = #{demandNam,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, demand_typ = #{demandTyp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, demand_phase = #{demandPhase,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, demand_desc = #{demandDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, process_sts = #{processSts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, principal = #{principal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, time_stamp = #{timeStamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, rec_stat = #{recStat,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where demand_no = #{demandNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select demand_no, cust_no, gather_date, demand_nam, demand_typ, demand_phase, demand_desc, process_sts, principal, create_date, create_time, create_user, update_date, update_time, update_user, time_stamp, rec_stat from ec_cust_demand where demand_no = #{demandNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select demand_no, cust_no, gather_date, demand_nam, demand_typ, demand_phase, demand_desc, process_sts, principal, create_date, create_time, create_user, update_date, update_time, update_user, time_stamp, rec_stat from ec_cust_demand
